```{r Validation rule 22: "The surgical procedure has an invalid main procedure code"}

valid_iche_codes <- read_csv("ICHE-Health-Intervention-Codes.csv", col_names = FALSE, col_types = "c") |>
  pull(1)

problems <- problems |>
  bind_rows(
    patients |>
      select(SITE_CODE, DEPARTMENT_NAME, DEPARTMENT_OU, NEOIPC_PATIENT_ID, PATIENT_TEI, key) |>
      rename(patient_key = key) |>
      inner_join(
        enrollments |>
          select(ENROLMENT_ID, ENROLMENT_DATE, key, patient) |>
          rename(enrollment_key = key),
        join_by(patient_key == patient)) |>
      left_join(
        data$surgeries |>
          select(
            enrollment,
            event,
            occurredAt,
            NEOIPC_SURGERY_PROCEDURE_DESCRIPTION,
            NEOIPC_SURGERY_MAIN_PROCEDURE_CODE) |>
          rename(
            EVENT_ID = event,
            EVENT_DATE = occurredAt,
            PROCEDURE_DESCRIPTION = NEOIPC_SURGERY_PROCEDURE_DESCRIPTION,
            PROCEDURE_CODE = NEOIPC_SURGERY_MAIN_PROCEDURE_CODE),
        join_by(enrollment_key == enrollment)) |>
      mutate(
        EVENT_TYPE = event_types("SUR"),
        PROBLEM_ID = 22L,
        PROCEDURE_CODE_VALID = if_else(
          is.na(PROCEDURE_CODE),
          TRUE,
          PROCEDURE_CODE %in% valid_iche_codes)) |>
      filter(!PROCEDURE_CODE_VALID) |>
      select(
        SITE_CODE,
        DEPARTMENT_NAME,
        DEPARTMENT_OU,
        NEOIPC_PATIENT_ID,
        PATIENT_TEI,
        ENROLMENT_ID,
        ENROLMENT_DATE,
        EVENT_ID,
        EVENT_TYPE,
        EVENT_DATE,
        PROBLEM_ID,
        PROCEDURE_CODE,
        PROCEDURE_DESCRIPTION
        ) |>
      distinct())
```
